job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Required skills:</strong></p><ul><li>8+ years of hands-on experience programming in Java.</li><li>Must be passionate about software development and delivering great work.</li><li>Experience with Spring Framework.</li><li>Strong understanding of OOP, design patterns, clean code and SOA architecture.</li><li>Experience with RESTful APIs and distributed systems.</li><li>Ideally looking for a Lead developer who has experience in leading projects/making architectural decisions for the development projects.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><span class="ql-cursor"></span>Top skills:</strong></p><ul><li>Java and Spring is must</li><li>Restful API</li><li>Design patterns, design principles, strong understanding of OOP</li></ul><p><br></p>
